body: Hey Brian and Morgan! Just wanted to welcome you all to the team for your summer internships. I'm Anthony Jones, the team's Scrum master. If there's anything you need help with please don't hesitate to reach out! Also, I am adding you two to the team's standup meetings which are every day at 11pm.
Thanks Anthony! It's nice to meet you. I'm so excited to be working here, and looking forward to working with you!
Thank you! I JUST took a class on agile last semester and we had to do standups and other Scrum ceremonies, so I am excited to see how they are done in the actual workplace hahaha!
Ohhh trust me, you won't be very excited for some of these meetings after the shine wears off...but please keep that attitude for as long as you can!
Do you actually stand up during the meetings or is that just a myth my professor told me?
We used to stand, but now we all just go into a plank stance instead to REALLY speed up the meetings ;)
